name: solriser
description: Lighting controller for the BRSS SolRiser, a Burning Man mutant vehicle art car.  The car contains 31 sets of RGB LEDs controlled via DMX.  This controller exposes OSC handlers to enable interactive administration and fun from a WIFI smart device app, like TouchOSC.  This controller code runs on an Arduino Yun with a Tinkerkit.com MasterDMX shield.
